title: Floral Design
shortDesc: From intimate dinner arrangements to grand wedding installations, each bloom tells your unique story.
fullDesc: With years of experience leading floral departments for luxury events, we approach each arrangement as a work of art. Our designs blend classic elegance with contemporary flair, using seasonal blooms and unexpected elements to create unforgettable impressions.

pricing.description: Bridal bouquets, ceremony florals, reception centerpieces
Office arrangements, corporate galas, product launches
Seasonal decor, home arrangements, holiday designs
